scripts.setup: npm i && npx husky install && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./backend i
scripts.setup-pnpm: pnpm i && npx husky install && pnpm --prefix ./frontend i && pnpm --prefix ./backend i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "pnpm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "pnpm --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint && npm --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.lint-pnpm: pnpm --prefix ./frontend run lint && pnpm --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: pnpm --prefix ./frontend run fix && pnpm --prefix ./backend run fix
